Package org.cpnsim.datacenter

Interface DatacenterPrice

All Known Subinterfaces:
Datacenter
All Known Implementing Classes:
DatacenterNull, DatacenterSimple
public interface DatacenterPrice
An interface to be implemented by each class that to record the price of the datacenter.
Since:
LGDCloudSim 1.0
Author:
Jiawen Liu

    setBwBillingType(String bwBillingType)
    Set the billing type of bandwidth It can be "used" or "fixed" used: the cost of bandwidth will be calculated according the amount of network data used:(instance.getBw() * lifeTimeSec) / 8 / 1024 * bwUtilization * unitBwPrice fixed: the cost of bandwidth will be calculated according the network bandwidth speed and time used: instance.getBw() * unitBwPrice * lifeTimeSec

      Get the price of renting a rack
      Returns:
      the price of renting a rack

    • getRackCost

      double getRackCost()
      A host needs to pay the basic rental cost to power on, and here we calculate the cost caused by the maximum number of hosts that need to be powered on throughout the entire process rackCost = maxPowerOnHostNum / hostNumPerRack * unitRackPrice
      Returns:
      the cost of renting racks

    • getResourceCost

      double getResourceCost()
      Calculate the price of cpu,ram,storage,bandwidth resources spent on running all instances
      Returns:
      the cost of renting racks

    • getAllCost

      double getAllCost()
      Calculate the RackCost+ResourceCost
      Returns:
      the total cost of the datacenter

    • setBwBillingType

      DatacenterPrice setBwBillingType(String bwBillingType)
      Set the billing type of bandwidth It can be "used" or "fixed"
      • used: the cost of bandwidth will be calculated according the amount of network data used:(instance.getBw() * lifeTimeSec) / 8 / 1024 * bwUtilization * unitBwPrice
      • fixed: the cost of bandwidth will be calculated according the network bandwidth speed and time used: instance.getBw() * unitBwPrice * lifeTimeSec
      Parameters:
      bwBillingType - the billing type of bandwidth
      Returns:
      the datacenter
      See Also:
      • DatacenterSimple.calculateInstanceBwCost(Instance)

    • getBwBillingType

      String getBwBillingType()
      Get the billing type of bandwidth
      Returns:
      the billing type of bandwidth

    • setBwUtilization

      DatacenterPrice setBwUtilization(double bwUtilization)
      Set the utilization of bandwidth. It is used to calculate the cost of bandwidth when the billing type is "used"
      Parameters:
      bwUtilization - the utilization of bandwidth
      Returns:
      the datacenter

    • getBwUtilization

      double getBwUtilization()
      Get the utilization of bandwidth
      Returns:
      the utilization of bandwidth
